Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Authorizes the New York city council to oversee the activities of the New York city housing authority
Summary: Authorizes the New York city council to oversee the activities of the New York city housing authority.
